pylayers.signal.bsignal.FHsignal.ifft¶

FHsignal.ifft(ffts=0, tt='centered')[source]¶

Inverse Fourier Transform Parameters ———-

ffts = 0 : no fftshift (default) ffts = 1 : apply fftshift tt = ‘centered’ default
return a real TUsignal
>>> e  = EnImpulse(fe=200)
>>> E  = e.fft()
>>> ee = E.ifft()
>>> assert(abs(sum(e.y-ee.y))<1e-13)
